sentiment_score_definition: x <= -0.35: Bearish; -0.35 < x <= -0.15: Somewhat-Bearish; -0.15 < x < 0.15: Neutral; 0.15 <= x < 0.35: Somewhat_Bullish; x >= 0.35: Bullish
relevance_score_definition: 0 < x <= 1, with a higher score indicating higher relevance.

feed.title: Certain Class B Ordinary Shares of New Providence Acquisition Corp. III are subject to a Lock-Up Agreement Ending on 20-OCT-2025.
feed.summary: Certain Class B Ordinary Shares of New Providence Acquisition Corp. III are subject to a 180-day lock-up agreement, preventing the sale or disposal of these shares until October 20, 2025. This lock-up period began on April 23, 2025, and applies to the company's sponsor, executive officers, and directors. The agreement covers various securities convertible into or exchangeable for shares, with specific exceptions.

feed.title: New Providence Acquisition Corp. III Completes Initial Public Offering of 30,015,000 Units on Nasdaq
feed.summary: New Providence Acquisition Corp. III successfully closed its initial public offering, raising $300,150,000 from the sale of 30,015,000 units, which included an over-allotment. Each unit, priced at $10.00, consists of one Class A ordinary share and one-third of a redeemable warrant, and began trading on Nasdaq under "NPACU". The company, a blank check company, intends to use the proceeds, held in trust, to pursue mergers and acquisitions, primarily in the consumer sector.
